projects.title: M3: Mood Movie Matcher - AI Recommendation Engine
projects.description: Engineered intelligent movie recommendation system leveraging RoBERTa sentiment analysis and Autoencoders on MovieLens dataset. Features personalized matching algorithms and hidden gem discovery through advanced NLP and deep learning techniques.

projects.title: Safe Data Cloak - Enterprise Privacy AI System
projects.description: Built production-ready data privacy platform utilizing advanced NLP transformers for intelligent redaction of PII, sensitive data, and domain-specific information. Features enterprise API integration and ML-powered unredaction capabilities using Random Forest algorithms.

projects.title: CodeCore - Full-Stack Technical Platform
projects.description: Comprehensive development platform built with modern web technologies for technical collaboration and project management.

projects.title: Computer Vision - Spherical Object Tracking
projects.description: Advanced computer vision system for real-time spherical object detection and tracking using machine learning algorithms.
